org.apache.juneau.parser

Class ParserSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Session
      • org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlParserSession, JsonParserSession, MsgPackParserSession, RdfParserSession, UonParserSession, XmlParserSession

    public class ParserSession
extends Session
    Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of Parser.

    This class is NOT thread safe. It is meant to be discarded after one-time use.

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParserSession

        public ParserSession(ParserContext ctx,
                     BeanContext beanContext,
                     Object input,
                     ObjectMap op,
                     Method javaMethod,
                     Object outer)
        Create a new session using properties specified in the context.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The context creating this session object. The context contains all the configuration settings for this object.
        beanContext - The bean context being used.
        input - The input.
        For character-based parsers, this can be any of the following types:
        • null
        • Reader
        • CharSequence
        • InputStream containing UTF-8 encoded text (or whatever the encoding specified by ParserContext.PARSER_inputStreamCharset).
        • byte[] containing UTF-8 encoded text (or whatever the encoding specified by ParserContext.PARSER_inputStreamCharset).
        • File containing system encoded text (or whatever the encoding specified by ParserContext.PARSER_fileCharset).

        For byte-based parsers, this can be any of the following types:
        • null
        • InputStream
        • byte[]
        • File
        op - The override properties. These override any context properties defined in the context.
        javaMethod - The java method that called this parser, usually the method in a REST servlet.
        outer - The outer object for instantiating top-level non-static inner classes.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        public InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws ParseException
        Wraps the specified input object inside an input stream. Subclasses can override this method to implement their own input streams.
        Returns:
        The input object wrapped in an input stream, or null if the object is null.
        Throws:
        ParseException - If object could not be converted to an input stream.

      • getReader

        public Reader getReader()
                 throws Exception
        Wraps the specified input object inside a reader. Subclasses can override this method to implement their own readers.
        Returns:
        The input object wrapped in a Reader, or null if the object is null.
        Throws:
        Exception - If object could not be converted to a reader.

      • getLastLocation

        public Map<String,Object> getLastLocation()
        Returns information used to determine at what location in the parse a failure occurred.
        Returns:
        A map, typically containing something like {line:123,column:456,currentProperty:"foobar"}

      • getJavaMethod

        public final Method getJavaMethod()
        Returns the Java method that invoked this parser.

        When using the REST API, this is the Java method invoked by the REST call. Can be used to access annotations defined on the method or class.

        Returns:
        The Java method that invoked this parser.

      • getOuter

        public final Object getOuter()
        Returns the outer object used for instantiating top-level non-static member classes. When using the REST API, this is the servlet object.
        Returns:
        The outer object.
